member.name: T:CustomControls.DialogValidation
member.summary:
Represents a set of buttons for dialog boxes with commonly used commands.
Implemented as a user control with a container for buttons.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of commands to activate. This will display as many buttons as there are active commands.

member.summary: Gets the current set of active commands.
member.remarks: Until the property is set, this property returns the default set, which is OK and Cancel. After the property is set, this property returns the content of the property.

member.summary: Contains unmanaged methods to read resources from a file.

member.summary: Flag to indicate the file should be loaded as data and not as executable code.

member.name: F:CustomControls.NativeMethods.RT_STRING
member.summary: Flag to indicate a string resource.

member.name: M:CustomControls.NativeMethods.LoadLibraryEx(System.String,System.IntPtr,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Loads a DLL in memory.
member.param: Path to the file to load.
This parameter is not used.
If LOAD_LIBRARY_AS_DATAFILE is specified, loads the file as data rather than executable code.
member.returns: A handle to the loaded file.

member.name: M:CustomControls.NativeMethods.FindResource(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Looks for a resource by its identifier in a file.
member.param: Handle of the loaded file.
Identifier of the resource to find.
Type of the resource.
member.returns: A handle to the resource.

member.summary: Loads a resource in memory.
member.param: Handle of the loaded file.
Handle to the resource to load.
member.returns: A handle to the block loaded in memory.

member.name: M:CustomControls.NativeMethods.SizeofResource(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the size of a resource.
member.param: Handle of the loaded file.
Handle to the resource to load.
member.returns: The size of the resource, in bytes.

member.summary: Frees a loaded DLL from memory.
member.param: Handle of the library to free.
member.returns: The returned value can be ignored.

member.name: T:Converters.ActiveCommandCollectionTypeConverter
member.summary: Converter from a string to a collection of .

member.name: M:Converters.ActiveCommandCollectionTypeConverter.CanConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Tell the system this converter can convert a string to a .
member.param: A System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context.
A System.Type that represents the type you want to convert from.
member.returns: True if is , or if the base converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Converters.ActiveCommandCollectionTypeConverter.ConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Converts the given object to the type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.
member.param: A System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context.
The System.Globalization.CultureInfo to use as the current culture.
The System.Object to convert.
member.returns: An that represents the converted value.

remarks.para: This method will convert a string with format "<commandname>, ..." where <commandname> is the name of one of the supported commands.

member.name: M:Converters.ActiveCommandCollectionTypeConverter.ConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts a to a string, using the specified context and culture information.
member.param: A System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context.
A System.Globalization.CultureInfo. If null is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The to convert.
The System.Type to convert the value parameter to.
member.returns: A string that represents the converted value.

remarks.para: This method will convert to a string with format "<commandname>, ..." where <commandname> is the name of each command in the collection.

member.name: T:Converters.ActiveCommandToContentConverter
member.summary: Converter from a to the associated content in a .

member.name: M:Converters.ActiveCommandToContentConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converter from a to the associated content in a .
member.param: The array of values that the source bindings in the produces. The value indicates that the source binding has no value to provide for conversion.
The type of the binding target property.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: A System.Object that represents the converted value.

remarks.para: The first value must be a .
The second value must be a .

member.name: M:Converters.ActiveCommandToContentConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a binding target value to the source binding values.
member.param: The value that the binding target produces.
The array of types to convert to. The array length indicates the number and types of values that are suggested for the method to return.
The converter parameter to use.
The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: An array of values that have been converted from the target value back to the source values.

member.name: T:Converters.ActiveCommandTypeConverter
member.summary: Converter from a string to a .

member.summary: Compares a name with known command names and execute a handler if found.
member.param: The command name to compare.
A handler to execute if a command is found.
member.returns: True if a match is found; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Converts the given object to the type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.

The System.Globalization.CultureInfo to use as the current culture.
The System.Object to convert.
member.returns: An that represents the converted value.
member.remarks: Compare a name with known command names and return the courresponding .

member.name: M:Converters.ActiveCommandTypeConverter.ConvertTo(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Converts a to a string, using the specified context and culture information.
member.param: A System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext that provides a format context.
A System.Globalization.CultureInfo. If null is passed, the current culture is assumed.
The to convert.
The System.Type to convert the value parameter to.
member.returns: A string that represents the converted value.

remarks.para: This method will convert to a string which is the name of the command.
